txt.en: 'We need ever-burning ore to keep the fires hot enough to cook the hard tack.\n\n'You will need a discerning eye to find the ore. Some veins are rich, some poor, all the ore will help. Travel through the tunnels and find a proper location.'
You are too far from an ore vein to search
The dwarves tending the flames to cook a large amount of hard tack require ever-burning ore to keep the flames hot enough.
You discovered a vein of ever-burning ore
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
Make your way through the tunnels and caverns to discover a vein of ever-burning ore to prospect.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> at this vein for ever-burning ore
